title: Chair, ca. 1820
description: Back legs flat sided, front legs flat excepting rounded front face; legs curve outward toward bottom, and back legs incline toward eachother at bottom.  Corner posts of back in a double curve terminating at top in on elemenatary volute form.  Flat top rail bowed toward back, slightly arched, with a rectangular panel of inset veneer surrounded by beading.  Splat horizontal, composed of small oblong faced with veneer, flanked oneither side by horizontal coupled C-scrolls deeply carved with foliage, terminating in volutes.  Seat flares  from back to front with straight edges.

tombstone.epitaph:
Chair, ca. 1820.
ca. 1820. wood (mahogany), wood (poplar), horse hair. Gift of Norvin Hewitt Green. 1938-58-1085.
